to the finance minister government of india subject demand from the income tax department for the year sir i have been served notice regarding the above mentioned subject in this regard i have to clarify that i disagree with the above mentioned demand as my office had deducted the tds of all the three assessment year which is mentioned in the intimation under section of the income tax act served by the cpc on i am a retired central government employee from the ministry of ayush plim ghaziabad summary of tds and demand is as below s no assessment year tds deducted demand rs rs rs rs rs rs form of the above three years are enclosed in this support in this regard i request you that demand may be nullified and refund of rs may be credited in my account thanking you regardsvikas chandra srivastavamobile no pan no aebps rdepartment plim ghaziabad ministry of ayush government of india

dear sir i want to state that i filed revised income tax return for the assessment year with my pan no abwpj f on th june o having refund claim but i did not receive the same so far pl do needful thanks ravinder kumar jain th september

dear sir ref pan no ahqpm esub request for change of advance tax paid accounting head ay under the jurisdiction of pr cit thrissur keralai am a senior citizen retired from brbnmpl a subsidiary of rbi printing currency notes and also an ex service man while paying advance tax rs for the assessment year through sbi tax payment portal inadvertently made a mistake doing in wrong accounting head which is under ids the advance tax payment was to make on as i earned interest on my bank deposit on my retirement benefits as understood the collection this ids has gone to the jurisdictional pr cit thrissur account i have sent request letter along with tax paid challan receipt to pr cit thrissur for correction of this account head and also registered for grievance redressal form the income tax portal sir as a truthful tax payer and the amount paid as advance was due for the interest earned from my bank deposit from retirement benefits only there is no undisclosed income or earning the mistake happened due to first time paying advance tax through bank portal and tax head was not known specifically kindly help me to resolve them by advising the concerned officer as i dont have any money again to pay as demanded by cpc bangalore through their demand notice i am aged and ailing living with small service pension kindly help do the needful as the office not responded any my appeal

respected sirwe have done etds work for state bank of india hussanibad branch under region jharkhand which include the filing of q q q and audit report for branch for financial year to financial year the filing of i q means tds filing for salary of employee ii q means tds filing other than employee iii q maens tds filing for tcs iv audit means the summary of work done in yearly basis for the branch we continuous sent them mail and also hard copy of bill to the branch but than also large amount is pending by their end we are facing mental as well as financial problems as it consume time and also staff and courrier expenses we have co operated to our level best to give our best of our services to them but than also a large amount of bills are been pending by their side we thereforerequest you to kindly look into this matter and initiate appropriate steps to resolve the issue at an early date and obliged note if again same documents will be required by your end than the documents willbe chargeable branch details where the payment have to be done a c holder name sharwan kumar jha coa c number type of account currentifsc code sbin enclos format of sharwan kumar jha co rubber stamp by the branch summary of pending bills pending bills and receipts thanking youyours sincerelysharwan kumar jhaoffice address second floor atithi complexabove yahoo restaurantuliyan main road kadma jamshedpur jharkhand mob

pan aaacs day sairgroup ag in nachlassliquidationpending refundattached copy of pan card itr screen shot of prevalidated bank account all three shows same name bank account prevalidated for fourth time there is no name mismatch and there is no other bank account please do not give same false resolution again and again please rectify your faulty cpc portal and issue refund cpc is closing complaint by giving same false resolution as under dear sir madam it is seen from the cpc portal for the ay ao has submitted the return in itba same has been processed by cpc determining a refund of rs prevalidation done earlier has been invalidated due to mismatch in itr name and account holder name hence taxpayer is requested to prevalidate the other bank account once again through e filing website as per the procedure given below i login to the e fling portal www incometaxindiaefiling gov in with your user id and password ii click on profile setting tab iii please select the option pre validate your bank account fill in the details and submit the request successfully please read our complaint properly we are saying we have only one bank account and same prevalidated successfully for forth time it is showing correct name and as per pan and itr still cpc says there is name mismatch and prevalidate other bank account there is no other bank account existing bank account validated successfully for forth time

retired as asstt commissioner central excise patna as on made several reresentation upto the office of chief commissioner patna while in service for updation reflection of salalary payments and tds made by the deptt for fy to but till date the complaints were remained unattended and tds in as on pan ajlps l have not been updated reflected to whom i should pay fee in cash or cheque i am tired and fed up for the non attedance of work damodar singh

sir i have been getting notices from the income tax office of the dy commissioner of income tax centralized processing center post bag no electronic city post office bangalore for the a y for the year a y my company employer kingfisher airlines has been deducting tax at source tds and they have not paid to your department why am i being harassed for the same and threatening notices of imprisonment is this the way to treat the honest tax paying citizens i get into depression on receiving such notices i have responded every time i get a notice from you with a letter attached from my company which says that they have deducted tds and are responsible for settling my taxes for the above period i once my tds has been deducted from my salary i cannot pay double tax hence i earnestly request the income tax department to stop sending for the notices

respected sirsub non receipt of refund for the assessment and assessment year aebpg d i filed my itr of assessment year on under acknowledgement no which was processed by income tax department vide letter dated and a demand of rs was raised wherein my income tax demand was rs and further interest was imposed for non payment of income tax for which my reply was filed and it was intimated that a sum of rs has been deducted by my department as tds that too prior to closure of financial year and it was intimated that there is no demand pending against me but tds has been deducted in excess which has to be refunded to me but my case was not cleared by the income tax department then again a letter dated was sent by me then again a letter dated was sent by me then i also submitted an online reply dated having transaction no now i have again filed my reply dated on sir in spite of so many correspondence my case has not been finalized till date causing me further non payment of refund for the assessment year as well which has also been processed by the income tax department vide order dated sir you are requested to please help me to get my income tax refunds for the ay and ay i shall be highly thankful to your goodself yours faithfullymohanjeet singh gulati

dear sir before you read please do not assume that this grievance is policy related and do not forward it to the tax planning division pls read this carefully and understand the issue if this is not clear please do call me at before you decide on this grievance this is my seventh petition on the same issue and not even once this is understood by cbdt so please do not close the petition for the sake of it i would like to point out the challenges in getting the pan card with the correct name format south indians specifically tamilians do not have the concept of first name and last name there is no family name or last name or surname for us we typically write our name as s murugan the initial is the first letter of the fathers name some people write like murugan s is this clear at all now the issue is twofold when you apply for the aadhaar one can easily get the aadhaar card in the way he or she wants for example one can get it like s murugan or s murugan or murugan s or murugan s so getting an aadhar in the correct name is easy for south indians however when you apply for pan card you cannot get it like s murugan or murugan s or murugan s in the pan application form it asks for the last name and a citizen is forced to expand the initial fully as the last name for example murugan sarangapani instead of murugan s so for pan i am forced to change the way we write our names though one can print the card as murugan s the database would still have the name as murugan sarangapani in the first name last name format only now that you get the pan card with the first name last name format the next challenge happens while you try to link aadhaar and pan aadhaar would have murugan s and pan would say murugan sarangapani and very unfortunately the system could not match it and hence pan and aadhaar cannot be linked it is so unfortunate that this issue was never thought through and we are forced to change our names in aadhaar also essentially though my name is s murugan just because of all this i need to keep my name as murugan sarangapani for the records it is like cutting the leg for shoe size hope you understand this would goi allow south indians tamilians to keep the name format as it is and not change it to first name last name format pls understand and do not simply forward it to the tax planning team pls note that due to this lacunae we are not in a position to link aadhar card with pan i am submitting this petition to the registrar of the supreme court to take cognizance of this issue and file a pil suo motu jai hind regards s murugan not murugan sarangapani

i have been writing about this since so long but nothing has been done so i am writing for the last time that it is submitted that i am the authorised representative of m s oankaar auto logistics a partnership firm having pan number aaefo h it is submitted that our income tax return for the a y was submitted on whereby we have sought a refund of rs however till date neither processing of our return has been done nor our refund has been given it is requested to do the needful as we are in financial diffculties these days similarly in a y was submitted on having acknowledgement number whereby by we have sought refund of rs for the same firm and same is the situation neither the processing has been done nor we have received the return pls help to get the refunds issued it is further submitted that in their last corresspondences they are saying that we are processing but nothing has been done in this case most imporant of all tome for passing order under section has also lapsed on for a y pls do the needful

my name is promila mittal and this is regarding my itr for ay issue is that from past few years someone else was showing salary against my pan number and their salary tds was showing in my as this was mainly due to the same pan assigned to two person i contacted the concerned party and they got it corrected for all other years except fy ay this tds has been deducted by block chief medical officer churu rajasthan tan number jprb c i never visited or worked there we always lived and are living in ghaziabad u p because of this wrong tds issue my itr for ay was responded with intimation u s with a tax due of i contacted their employee promila jat who was alloted same pan number at her mobile no but no rectification has been done for ay i also contacted cm ho for churu at mr kamal account officer at and other account officer mr narayan at to revert the tds for ay from my pan and add it to the correct pan of their employee but i received no help from their side i also sent an email to nagour dcit incometax gov in asking them to transfer my pans itr to ghaziabad office so that i can visit income tax office in vaishali ghaziabad to seek help regarding my case i sent them reminder emails also but have not received a single reply from their side i never did a job and never received a salary i am following up on this from many months and have received no output please help resolving this asap i am attching the email correspondance with nagour dcit incometax gov in few details as needed my pan awlpp kaddress ff plot no sector vaishali ghaziabad u p tan of wrong tds deductor jprb ctan deductor contact details contact of their employee whose tds is shown in my as promila jat thankspromila mittal

pl refer to my complain no cbodt e dt which is not yet resolved it is a case where my it refund for the financial year was stopped and adjusted with tds not deposited by my employer against returns as a result both of my returns are in limbo and nearly rs lakh of refund stopped pl refer to the high court judgement of gujarat high court in sept which clearly states that tds credit has to be given to the assesse even if gov has not got the same there are previous high court judgement saying the same thing inspite of that you refuse to comply as if cbdt does not fall under indian constitution pl resolve my case and process the refund for both the year i an in severe financial distress and need the funds urgently there is no point having a complain resolution platform if it behaves exactly like the original defaulter https thetaxtalk com landmark judgement tds credit need to be given even if tds is not deposited by the deductor

i mohammad tariq khan respectfully submit that i am entitled to refund of inr which is not released till date further please note that while processing the revised return of income interest under section b of the income tax act has been erroneously levied in view of the above rectification petition was filed on february may and august to vacate the erroneous interest levied under section b of the act and release the refund of inr due to me however the said refund has not been released to me yet in this regard please find below the grievance petition for the assessment year further i respectfully submit the following documents for your kind perusal copy of submissions filed on february may and august return of income along with computation of income and taxes thereon for the previous year and copy of form for the assessment year also inspite of the regular follow ups the refund of inr has not been issued to me till now the same is causing undue hardship to me hence i request you to issue the refund to me favouring the following bank account of mine and also send the refund cheque to the address mentioned below bank kotak mahindra bankaccount number mohammad tariq khanc o ankita guptaibm ind p ltd ia tax teamblkd th floor manyata business parkouter ring road nagawarabangalore i shall look forward for your favourable response with sincere regardsmohammad tariq khan

my bank account is my account in state bank of india dahod road memorial chowk in the middle section against petrol pump which has account number on date checking the balance on my bank account my account was found to be less rupees on my account so at that time i check my bank statement rupees have been withdrawn from the account on which is beyond my knowledge i have my atm as well as my mobile number is not added so there is no question of otp coming on mobilethus a total of rupees has been deducted from my account statement hence when we introduced to the bank met the bank manager on and he replied indirectly that you had to report to the police station and further said that you have all the responsibility so that you have atm later on we went to dahod town police station the outward application number of dated thereafter the copy of this application is given in the book which the bank has not accepted they told us to do the fir at the police station then we went to the police station and asked to write fir but our fir was not written so respect sir you will help us to know sir or get our money back to us and at dahod town police station tell us to write our fir so i can present it in the bank to p i sira division office dahod dahod cyber crime office dahod dahod chief general maneger sbi lho officer ahmedabad bank manager sbi dahod

respected prime ministermy name is asif khan i got two wheeler finance from hdfc bank neemuch mp due to missing my job i became unemployed and now i am not able to get as much salary in the new job as i can afford to cover the expenses of the house or to pay the installment of the car so i could not deposit the installments of the vehicle on time now the bank is harassing me and my family a lot i request you to get rid of this loan my loan amount is not very big please forgive my loan from the bank i had earlier written an application for your help whose no pmopg e but no response was received please do solve my problem as soon as possible my loan account no there are which is hdfc the bank is registered in the name of neemuch mp tarannum asif khan

matter related to union bank of india chandigarh circlesub malafide disposal of pg portal grievance deabd e ref release of postal cover by bank authoritiesabove mentioned grievance was disposed malafidely by stating the same as suggestion the bank representative assured me over phone that needful shall be done to curb the wastage of money as the postal cover has a limited reach and the outcome shall be informed after the receipt of report from chandigarh circle the grievance is presented again for appropriate action on union bank of india released a postal special cover from chandigarh it was a commendable effort for raising public awareness about cleanliness image annexed as pdf file but it is regretted to state that the message was conveyed to very few people as the philately business of india post is running into huge loss shrinked considerably the message failed to reach the target i e youth anil a former employee of the bank is leaving no stone unturned to criticise the philately policies of india post on various online platforms hence release of postal cover is a wastage of money it is requested to discard the release of such postal covers in future and opt for online platforms which had a better connect with youth as well as wider reach to other people as well

punjab national bank housing finance hampinagar bangalore have forced and took papers containing to company and self saying loan will be sanctioned since they did not fulfill their commitment i approached your goodness for the favour on your instructions they have released only percent when i approached them requesting for the balance they are trying to pass on the subject saying only is payable the rest cannot be given may i request your good self to instruct them to pay the balance as the matter was their force the payment was made based on their assurances the payment made other wise the same will be refunded as they are to be blamed for the commitment they are responsible to pay back completely including the gst paid by me the bankers are going around and making a false commitments to many and not fulfilling their promises i was totally taken back their utterances of asking whether the cheque passed and thereby there commitments of filing of false commitments finished as the target was achieved if this was the case i would not have given my documents at all even now i request d mr girish the person behind the complete episode also i spoke to mr pradeep today he said the charges levied cannot be paid back which is very vague and not befitting their commitment of things through and the intentions only to gather many files and reject later saying unwanted reason s as this genuine case in respect of ref no nhl blrv question in regard with ref no deabd e should not be closed the same should be persisted henceforth too please instruct them to kindly do the need and make them commit without delay regards

respected siri had given several times complaint but till now i have not got solution for my complaints as day by day my problems in business are increasing and i am unable to run my business sir i do not have electricity in my company from past days electricity department has disconnected my electricity connect of my company due to i am unable to pay the bill as my amount is been block buy the railway so i request you sir please activate my electricity connect i will pay my all dues completed please help me sir kindly reply to my complaint i had been applied in good services tax scheme but till now i am unable to track my application in good services tax portal and bank is giving tension and torture to repay the amount but they are not sanctioning the term loan to giving salaries for employees sir kindly help me i had giving several compliant regarding my problems till now i had not got the any kind of support from the government only the duty of the government of to business man is to remind to pay taxes to government but the government is not help then business man if government is not help me i do not have any kind of believe on the government i had given my first compliant on the only the compliant are closing but i am unable to get any kind help from the government side till nowsir i request you to send one of the officer from other zone of indian railway and bank so that they will do justice to my compliant because local officer of indian railway and bank are not doing the justice to me and their is no kind of help to me from them sir i request you to do a surprise inspection of my compliant without any information to the local officers the local officer are high corrupted sirdue to insufficient of the funds and employees for the work railway terminated working tender and i got recently a new tender that was also terminated due to insufficient of the funds in my working in this year i got tender terminated in indian railway due to insufficient of the funds and employees i am having sod account in your bank the account number is with the limit of rs million for the last days i am unable to pay the interest for the loan its due three reasons only sir one of the reason for the pass six months indian railway has not clear my due bills of the worth rs crore due to that i had unable to pay interest on time indian railway had kept my bills amount on the hold due to that i had not paid the salary of my employees for the pass six months for the worth of rs millionwhen we are contracting the branch manager of bank the branch manager is telling to us to increase the sale and turnover of the company when we bring new work that time branch manager is not sanction any kind of the loan to us bank manager is speaking very roughly vulgarly and his behavior is very rudely with me bank manager is giving mental torture to me bank manager is saying that you are not important customer to the bank so you can shift your loan to another bank as you are waste customer to our bankfinance minister has told the company which is registered under ministry of micro small and medium enterprises if their account is going under non performing asset the banks should not give any kind of torture and notice till st march but bank manager has released the notice when the account has gone for non performing asset immediately within hours and is telling to pay the whole amount within days so the bank is not following the rule of government they are following the rules of their own so bank is bigger than government not the government government with rbi they had release new scheme of restructuring under this scheme company get loan sanction from the bank but bank manager is not giving loan under this scheme sir please take serious actions regarding my complaint till now i have not got any kind of solutions for my complaint please help me

why government discriminate bank officers and other central government officers when we talk in terms of their salaries why minimum wage act is not applicable for bank employee and officers why government and rbi does monitor the strength of the staff sanctioned and present at the public sector banks

appeal to income tax department of india to provide our society pan number as the pan card sent by nsdl pan service unit was not delivered by corrupt and dishonest post office staff mr prashanto pal of ramchandrapur bo under sankrail s o pin dear sir madamwe women under national rural livelihood mission nrlm a rural poverty elevation scheme offered by govt of india runs this mahila samabay samity it is registered under co operative society act i smt jhuma chakraborty secretory of sankrail satadal bahumukhi mahila sangha prathamik samabay samity limited applied for pan card for our society the pan card was dispatched by india post vide speed post article number ea in the below was the given address to deliver the pan card c o smt jhuma chakrabortyramchandrapursankrailhowrah pin this dishonest post man of ramchandrapur post office did not come to deliver the pan to my address as mentioned on the envelope and returned it to nsdl income tax pan servicing unit i got an intimation from nsdl income tax pan servicing unit that my pan card will be delivered by th june as i did not receive it by th june i visited ramchandrapur bo to enquire the post master informed me that the article containing pan card was sent back to sender the mischievous postman told that i did not submit my trade license to the post office and that is the reason they had sent it back to the sender it is to inform that the pan card was issued towards our registered co operative society under category association of persons no trade license is required to get such pan card moreover my address with my name was mentioned in the receiver address the post man ramchandrapur bo should have come to my residence before sending it back to the origin later we also came to know from a few other localities that this bad post office staff harassed other people too in similar way the provided email address was not accessible by me as i have created it long ago perhaps the pan number was sent to the email address now due to corruption of department of post i did not get the physical copy of the card we are even not able to know the already issued pan number we also raised a separate complaint in department of post for this matter i appeal to income tax department of india to send the pan number to my address and also re attempt to deliver the pan card to my address sincerelysmt jhuma chakraborty

we are an online seller and are engaged in selling religious articles like kumkum and tilak etc and generally ship through india post registered parcel we visit our post office almost everyday to book and ship our parcels almost from last days they are updating their software and till date its only partially updated we are not able to ship our articles by them no action is being taken from their superiors and the post master at katra vaishnodevi post office who actually is a reasonable man claims that he is not getting proper backup from his superiors every body in the senior level management is reluctant to do his duties and there seems to be some kind of casual behavior negligence on the post master of the district udhampur katra vaishnodevi post office falls under udhampur division of department of posts with pincode their computers are of outdated technology and crashes every month when asked regarding the same they just have a casual reply for not being supported from the upper hirarchy no one is actually willing to do the needful we also tried to contact few of landline number of their seniors provided to us by them by no one actually received the calls and those who did never resolved the issue due to this small sellers like us are at loss from last days because we are not actually able to ship their updated software is not able to recognize the tracking ids starting with cq at katra and earlier it was doing just ok if not good they dont have a substitute for cq parcels postal department knows what cq is in jammu and kashmir kindly raise this issue and help us because we see our great pm shri narendra modi ji on india post website home page and he is definitely not slow please take appropriate action and support this noble cause and our basic right to use the services of department of posts regardsvarun jamwal

sonim technologies india pvt ltd is a subsidiary of sonim technologies inc which is headquartered in san mateo california we are normally bringing in mobile supplies for r d purpose bangalore and we do submit imei endorsement according to customs regularization the imei certificate is given by ab mobile standards alliance pvt ltd msai which cost usd for new model enrollment and usd for new tac enlistment we have been utilizing this service from past two years and now they are demanding us to pay lump sum amount of rs as annual service fee towards providing the imei certificate we are importing phones only for r d purpose and no revenue has been generated from these phones after or months these phones will be either damaged or corrupted due to hardware software issue kindly note we are already paying usd new model enlistment and usd new tac enrollment and now again yearly administration fee is too burden for us and after a few solicitations they have not given any legitimate clarification to the new expense structure there are a ton of grievances made about msai on their higher charge and we are ignorant whether this is government expense or their administration charges please refer to et dated th july in which already this issue has been addressed https www varindia com news why msai is overcharging for imea certificationhttps economictimes indiatimes com tech hardware msai overcharging for imei certification allege handset companies articleshow cmspresently we are compelled to pay this charge by msai as they have quit issuing the imei certificate because of this our project is on hold as we cant continue any further testing without the telephones would seek your assistance and precious time to talk discuss on the subject matter i have attached their mail demanding for the service fee to be paid

online complaint against independent tv for organised economic crime of fraudlence racketeering cheating unfair and illegal practice under protection of govt officials sir madamwith due respect it is submitted that since the broadcasting company independent tv has started it has never given any satisfactory broadcasting services to any single customer till date that the independent tv deliberately and intentionally from starting continuously violating the regulations of telecommunication broadcasting and cable services standards of quality of service and consumer protection addressable systems with its amendments as upto till date that firstly company has installed the connection after one year long harassment period of booking in the fake name of reliance big tv and given false commitments again and again that the independent tv has deposited in advance all the money in the name of freedom plan of five year package and when the honble trai has regulates new tariff policy the company has also vioteted the rules that the independent tv has also intentionally and deliberately violated the directions of honble trai vide dated to m s independent tv ltd under section read with sub clause v of clause b of sub section of section of the telecom regulatory authority of india act to ensure compliance of various provisions of the new regulatory framework for broadcasting and cable tv services that the company has blocked the mostly paid channels without any consent of the customer despite it all that channels was the part of package before the new tariff policy that at now independent tv has switched off all the networks and signals in june without giving any notice to the customers and now no channel has been broadcast at the companys platform that there is no helpline number is working of the independent tv and despite several emails of the customers has send to the customer care nodel officer compliance officer of independent tv but no any reply has given by the company that despite several requests of refund of the balance money in preposition to the balance validity company has never returned it to any of the customers and at present when the company has completely stopped all the broadcasting and customer services in june so therefore please strictly direct the independent tv to refund the balance money in preposition to balanced validity with immediate effect and also take legal action to punish the company for organised economic crime of fraudulence racketeering cheating unfair illegal practice and violation of rules and regulations it is also submitted that this complaint is also lodged before the officials concerned but no any official has taken any action against independent tv despite several complaints it seems that govt officials are to provide illegal protection to independent tv rather than to take strict action against said company reason best known to them thanks and regard for your immediate action in the matter in the interest of general public yours faithfullylalit kumar bhola nath nagarshahdara delhi mobile no

dear respected pmo help desk for serious and quick remedial action on i travelled from chennai mas to buxar bxr by train no bengaluru dinapur sangamirtra express holding rc s sleeper class ticket i was hopeful of getting an assured berth perhaps the train after passing through two or three stations to my surprise i had to undergo a nightmarish experience which was fuelled by the penetrable system the s compartment was overcrowded with roughly twice the maximum capacity of passengers per coach approximately nos no tte was found in almost all sleeper class coaches in this sangamitra train and the mystery is not known to common people like us instead a one person vigilant squad visited on and they merely took few passengers at random from out of such a huge number of illegally boarded passengers for namesake levied penalty and after collecting the fine they allowed the same passengers to continue their journey as though the penalty regularised their illegal occupancy in a reserved compartmentmy pnr date of journey reservation status rc s sitting on another single person squad came to our s compartment and found the occupants of berth s did not have a valid ticket he again levied fine and after payment of fine permitted the same passengers to continue their journey as though bert is allotted to them whereas i as holder o f rc was deprived of the same berth which should have been alloted to me in preference to an illegal occupant very important observations for quick remedial action the entire train with more than double the normal capacity is prone to safety hazards both within the train and on the track because being a super fast express it runs at a speed between and kmph the impact of such overload trains may not have equitably distributed load to keep the right equilibrium in the allocation of load it may lead to unevenly loaded chain of coaches straining the engine to heavy wear and tear and also losing control due to the imbalance the passengers at a very heavy risk the safety of the track may also be a cause of serious worry over a period of time request all right thinking persons to view these oft repeated with a positive outlook and plug the loopholes in the system as well as at the executive level enforcing accountability for negligence we come across such incidents more in the south central railways and eastern railways with immense pranams and respectsv s iyer

dear sir i had booked tickets for adults on apr for travelling on apr from anand vihar terminal to bhagalpur in train under ac through irctc website at around pm on apr i received a text message from indian railway stating that train vikramshila express is rescheduled from anand vihar terminal exp departure is at hrs on at around pm on apr again i received a message from indian railway stating that train vikramshila express is rescheduled from anand vihar terminal expected departure is at hrs on at around pm i came to know through news media that poorva express has met with an accident near to kanpur central station for which cancellations rescheduling of trains are being done after knowing about the tragic news i decided not to travel to my destination accordingly at around pm i visited irctc website for filing of online tdr from the registered e mail id clubbed with irctc account but could not be done from my end after this i called customer care of irctc from where i have been advised by the customer care executive of irctc that sir if you are unable to file online tdr then you send all the details of tickets at irctc email id etickets irctc co in and irctc will file the tdr on your behalf accordingly i sent an email upon the said email id at pm on apr for filing of tdr by irctc official on apr i received an email upon my email id from irctc stating that dear customer the tdr filed against pnr number with reason train late more than three hours and passenger not travelled has been repudiated by system as per the indian railways refund rules reason for repudiation rejection null when i called to customer care of irctc then the executive sitting there told me that you will not get the refund of money as you have not filed your tdr before hrs of departure of train whereas i had sent all the details to irctc email id as advised by the customer care executive of irctc now i want to know that where i am at fault why i should face a loss of rs when irctc failed to file the tdr in time this short of amount keeps an important meaning in my life in view of the above my humble request to you that please help me to get a refund of rs from irctc i hope that i will get a fair justice upon my issue
